ygData.subject: RE: Just joined
ygData.msgSnippet: Aiya, tat s only possible u u r at zone, otherwise enchanter also need to die first b4 the train will hit the wiz.  In HH keep some guai lan enchanter like to
ygData.messageBody:
Aiya, tat's only possible u u r at zone, otherwise enchanter also need to
die first b4 the train will hit the wiz. In HH keep some guai lan
enchanter like to charm the warrior when it spawn and dun let other kill
it. So we cancel magic and nuke the warrior to death, hehe.

Btw, warrior con red to us. I think I will start an intensive training
camp for all the lvl 30 to 34 power lvling when I reach lvl 30 ;)

Ziltus

On Thursday, 12 August, 1999 8:57 PM, Sereph [SMTP:garford@...]
wrote:
> From: Sereph <garford@...>
>
> If any goon does that, I'll just let him/her have the mob THEN I'll start
a
> train and hit him/her/it from the back, before him/her/it realise
>
> LKW wrote:
>
> > From: LKW <leekw13@...>
> >
> > Oh, if u got some CB enchanters who charm ya mob, you can counter that
by
> > casting cancel magic on the mob, for those wiz out there, hehe.
> >
> > Ziltus
> >
> > On Thursday, 12 August, 1999 6:23 PM, Sereph [SMTP:garford@pacific.n
et.sg]
> > wrote:
> > > From: Sereph <garford@...>
> > >
> > > My equipment are 99.99% in dungeon that are super camped in Cazic
> > (Solesek A/B, Upper/Lower Guk, Cazic, OOT's Oracle, Najera), and since
I'm
> > a
> > > freaking enchanter, I cannot out nuke a wiz if one decides to steal
kills
> > from me (well, I can try to charm the mob and piss off the wiz......)
> > >
> > > Will take longer for me to gather back my equipment then hitting 50
> > >
> > > Gary Qui Hong Loong wrote:
> > >
> > > > From: Gary Qui Hong Loong <kanglun@...>
> > > >
> > > > wah, what u worry? with ur spells, and lvl , u can get back on ur
feet
> > very fast. Imagine my paladin kana that. 5kpp worth of stuff gone...
> > > > I will quit for sure.
> > > >
> > > > Sereph wrote:
> > > >
> > > > > From: Sereph <garford@...>
> > > > >
> > > > > Well, my lvl 39(exact XP condition before she "died", means, will
hit
> > 40 in 2 weeks if I play there) enchanter was recently revived at
> > > > > Cazic after sending treatening e-mails to Verant, but it NAKED.
Else,
> > no one is on Cazic.
> > > > >
> > > > > Sabella Anna Estasis, currently banging head against the wall for
the
> > lost of 1000plat of equipment.
> > > > >
> > > > > kwchow@... wrote:
> > > > >
> > > > > > From: kwchow@...
> > > > > >
> > > > > > Hi All,
> > > > > >
> > > > > > Just joined this after hearing from Kalandra of Innoruuk about
this
> > place.
> > > > > >
> > > > > > Currently I appear on Innoruuk as Yuffie the Cleric or
Melodeuss
> > the Bard. Or Ungaroth the TSK on Cazic Thule if anybody plays there.
> > > > > >
> > > > > > Give me a tell if you are looking for a party or questing,
goodluck
> > and Gud Bashing!
> > > > > >
> > > > > > EQ Addict
> > > > > >
> > > > > > P.S Currently having problems trying to subscribe and suffering
> > from withdrawal symptoms :(
